channel.title: ::time command / ::max command pleas help
channel.description: I was looking for a command when you do ::time it tells you how many hours and minutes you played for also would like a ::max command that tells you what your max hit is. please help me get these.

item.title: ::time command / ::max command pleas help
item.dc:creator: @thugnit1019 thugnit1019
item.description:
@thugnit1019 wrote:

it wont be to hard ill rip mine and post it for you to put in in a little bit after i fix what im doin

Read full topic

item.title: ::time command / ::max command pleas help
item.dc:creator: @thugnit1019 thugnit1019
item.description:
@thugnit1019 wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:2, topic:519004”][code=Java]if (COMMAND_VARIABLE.equalsIgnoreCase(“time”)) {
//print time shit
}

if (COMMAND_VARIABLE.equalsIgnoreCase(“max”)) {
//do max shit
}[/code][/quote]

[quote=“freddie griner, post:5, topic:519004”][/quote]
umm its 317 pi… and I know how to start the command… a retard could figure that much out… im saying I don’t know what the max shit and time shit hes talking about is… if I knew I wouldn’t be here asking for help putting them together to make the command is the simple part…
[/quote]

like i said the max stuff is extremely easy read my post and figure out how to do the max yourself and then i will help you with the time stuff since you have a pi

Read full topic

item.title: ::time command / ::max command pleas help
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

you need to create a time variable upon each player entity. save it to the player’s account. set the value of the variable to the current time upon account creation.

when the command is called, take the current time. subtract the created time from it to get the total played time.

as for the max hit, look through the combat classes to find out where the max hit is calculated. then just call the variable in the command

that is the most you’re getting

Read full topic

item.title: ::time command / ::max command pleas help
item.dc:creator: @freddie_griner freddie griner
item.description:
@freddie_griner wrote:

thugnit1019:

…making a command is very simple what he posted was the simplest part if you don’t understand that you don’t have much of a future with servers…not to mention for someone to spoonfeed you a command that gives you time would require you to tell us what type of source your using what revision it is and if its a 317, if its PI or not or atleast post a command you already have. The max command is extremely easy to make anybody should be able to make that all you have to do is copy a command you already have and find something in one of your files that gives experience to a skill then copy that and put that into the command multiple times but change the number of the skill each time until you have every skill covered i believe theirs 27 and time command would require you to make it count and save the amount of time played to a players save file i can rip it from my source and give you the code for it if your server is a PI if its not it would require converting to make it work but as you havent said what type of source your using it wouldnt do any good giving you anything right now

umm its 317 pi… and I know how to start the command… a retard could figure that much out… im saying I don’t know what the max shit and time shit hes talking about is… if I knew I wouldn’t be here asking for help putting them together to make the command is the simple part…

Read full topic
